pullRequest.title: Changes to notify account updates in MySqlAccountService to consumers
pullRequest.bodyText:
Contains following changes:

Notify account updates in MySqlAccountService to consumers
Add version field in Container
Move selectInactiveContainersAndMarkInZk to AbstractAccountService

nodes.bodyText: You need to include updatedAccountsInDB, no?
This seems like the wrong metric (or maybe needs name change).
Does this updatedAccounts hold whole account info? If yes, we may end up printing thousands of containers here. We can either print account id (as previous code did) or change this to DEBUG level.

+1, although request from Nuage doesn't purely update the account (for now only account owner and description can be modified), it's still better to include the account if we update account's attributes without touching any container in the future.
Is there a unit test for this?
Same here, do we have unit test to verify the updated version?
At some point we should use jackson library for json serialization.
nitpicking: can you move this method before toString method so the getter methods can stay together.
Don't forget to update equals method in this class. And BTW, what is the difference between isSameContainer and equals methods?
